title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-1.4 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-1.4 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision in this Part or its application or
circumstances is held invalid, the remainder of this Part and the application
of those provisions to persons or circumstances, other than those to which it
is held invalid, will not be affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-1.4

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
